generalInfo:
This safari adventure takes you deep into the heart of the Okavango Delta, with stays at two exceptional camps: Shinde and Kanana.

At Shinde, a secluded northern delta hideaway, offers seven safari tents and a family suite among ancient trees. The solar-powered lodge features decks, lounges, a dining area, fire deck, curio shop, and pool. Enjoy day and night game drives, guided walks, motor boat trips, and mokoro excursions, spotting elephants, lions, and abundant birdlife.

At Kanana Camp in the southwestern delta, eight spacious tents sit among ebony and acacia trees, each with raised decks overlooking winding channels. The open-sided lounge, dining area, cocktail bar, and plunge pool offer a relaxed retreat. Seasonal activities include game drives, mokoro excursions, boating, fishing, guided walks, sunset cruises, and visits to a rare heronry. Guests can also sleep under the stars on the sleepout deck (Aprilâ€“November).

Airstrip transfers are 10 minutes to Shinde and 30 minutes to Kanana, making both camps easily accessible yet wonderfully remote.
